member.name: T:SharpHook.Reactive.IReactiveGlobalHook
member.summary: Represents a global reactive keyboard and mouse hook.
member.remarks: All observables of objects of this interface are completed when the object is disposed, unless stated otherwise.

member.name: P:SharpHook.Reactive.IReactiveGlobalHook.IsRunning
member.summary: Gets the value which indicates whether the global hook is running.
member.value: if the global hook is running. Otherwise, .

member.name: P:SharpHook.Reactive.IReactiveGlobalHook.IsDisposed
member.summary: Gets the value which indicates whether the global hook is disposed.
member.value: if the global hook is disposed. Otherwise, .
member.remarks: A disposed global hook cannot be started again.

member.name: P:SharpHook.Reactive.IReactiveGlobalHook.HookEnabled
member.summary: Gets an observable which emits a value when the global hook is enabled.
member.value: An observable which emits a value when the global hook is enabled.
member.remarks: The observable emits a value when the or method is called and then immediately completes.

member.name: P:SharpHook.Reactive.IReactiveGlobalHook.HookDisabled
member.summary: Gets an observable which emits a value when the global hook is disabled.
member.value: An observable which emits a value when the global hook is disabled.
member.remarks: The observable emits a value when the method is called and then immediately completes.

member.name: P:SharpHook.Reactive.IReactiveGlobalHook.KeyTyped
member.summary: Gets an observable which emits a value when a key is typed.
member.value: An observable which emits a value when a key is typed.

member.name: P:SharpHook.Reactive.IReactiveGlobalHook.KeyPressed
member.summary: Gets an observable which emits a value when a key is pressed.
member.value: An observable which emits a value when a key is pressed.

member.name: P:SharpHook.Reactive.IReactiveGlobalHook.KeyReleased
member.summary: Gets an observable which emits a value when a key is released.
member.value: An observable which emits a value when a key is released.

member.name: P:SharpHook.Reactive.IReactiveGlobalHook.MouseClicked
member.summary: Gets an observable which emits a value when a mouse button is clicked.
member.value: An observable which emits a value when a mouse button is clicked.

member.name: P:SharpHook.Reactive.IReactiveGlobalHook.MousePressed
member.summary: Gets an observable which emits a value when a mouse button is pressed.
member.value: An observable which emits a value when a mouse button is pressed.

member.name: P:SharpHook.Reactive.IReactiveGlobalHook.MouseReleased
member.summary: Gets an observable which emits a value when a mouse button is released.
member.value: An observable which emits a value when a mouse button is released.

member.name: P:SharpHook.Reactive.IReactiveGlobalHook.MouseMoved
member.summary: Gets an observable which emits a value when the mouse cursor is moved.
member.value: An observable which emits a value when the mouse cursor is moved.

member.name: P:SharpHook.Reactive.IReactiveGlobalHook.MouseDragged
member.summary: Gets an observable which emits a value when the mouse cursor is dragged.
member.value: An observable which emits a value when the mouse cursor is dragged.

member.name: P:SharpHook.Reactive.IReactiveGlobalHook.MouseWheel
member.summary: Gets an observable which emits a value when the mouse wheel is scrolled.
member.value: An observable which emits a value when the mouse wheel is scrolled.

member.name: M:SharpHook.Reactive.IReactiveGlobalHook.Run
member.summary: Runs the global hook on the current thread, blocking it. The hook can be destroyed by calling the method.
member.exception: Starting the global hook has failed.
The global hook is already running.
The global hook has been disposed.

member.name: M:SharpHook.Reactive.IReactiveGlobalHook.RunAsync
member.summary: Runs the global hook without blocking the current thread. The hook can be destroyed by calling the method.
member.returns: An observable which is completed when the hook is destroyed.
member.exception: Starting the global hook has failed.
The global hook is already running.
The global hook has been disposed.

remarks.para: Since the underlying native API for running a global hook is blocking, the only way to run it without blocking the current thread is to run it on a separate thread.
The returned observable is hot. It emits a single value and then immediately completes when the hook is destroyed.

member.name: T:SharpHook.Reactive.Logging.IReactiveLogSource
member.summary: Represents a reactive source of libuiohook logs.

member.name: P:SharpHook.Reactive.Logging.IReactiveLogSource.MessageLogged
member.summary: An observable which is emitted when libuiohook logs a message.

member.summary: Gets the value which indicates whether the log source is disposed.
member.value: if the log source is disposed. Otherwise, .
member.remarks: The observable doesn't emit any values in a disposed log source.

member.summary: Runs the global hook without blocking the current thread. The hook can be destroyed by calling the method.
member.returns: An observable which is completed when the hook is destroyed.

member.name: M:SharpHook.Reactive.ReactiveGlobalHookAdapter.Dispose
member.summary: Destroys the global hook.
member.remarks: After calling this method, the hook cannot be started again. If you want to do that, create a new instance of .
